long_description: Expand your load-carrying capacity with the Racktime Top-It front bike rack, which mounts to your bike's fork and can support panniers or other bags. Using 10mm aluminum tubes, this rack offers sturdy support for carrying up to 22 lbs. on the front of your bike. Carries all standard panniers and is compatible with Racktime Snap-It bags and accessories (not included). Please note: In order to mount the Top-It front bike rack, the bicycle fork must have mounting eyelets in the mid-section of the fork legs.
short_description: Expand your load-carrying capacity with the Racktime Top-It front bike rack, which mounts to your bike's fork and can support panniers or other bags.
